title: Archaeological artifacts should not be for sale in thrift shops. But putting them in a museum is harder than it sounds.
summary: Archaeologists discovered artifacts for sale in a thrift shop. They decided to create a college course on what to do about them.

title: Science history: James Webb Space Telescope launches — and promptly cracks our view of the universe — Dec. 25, 2021
summary: The James Webb Space Telescope blasted off from a launchpad in French Guiana in 2021, before reaching a spot in orbit a million miles away. It soon began breaking cosmology.

title: 'Gospel stories themselves tell of dislocation and danger': A historian describes the world Jesus was born into
summary: The modern Christmas themes of peace and joy were in short supply amid the ‘dislocation and danger’ of ancient Judea – as they are in today’s fractured world too.

title: 'What the heck is this?' James Webb telescope spots inexplicable planet with diamonds and soot in its atmosphere
summary: Scientists using the James Webb telescope observed a distant exoplanet with an atmosphere of soot and diamonds, challenging all explanations.

title: We now know much more about how our ancestor 'Lucy' lived —  and died
summary: Fifty years after a fossil skeleton of Australopithecus afarensis was unearthed in Ethiopia, we know so much more about how this iconic species lived and died.

title: The 9 best things to see in the night sky with binoculars from November 2025 to January to 2026
summary: Discover the highlights of the Northern Hemisphere’s winter night sky with our guide to the top celestial sights to enjoy through binoculars between November 2025 and January 2026.

title: Earth's seasons vary wildly, even at the same latitude, new research finds
summary: Earth's seasons look very different at locations not far from each other, 20 years' worth of satellite data reveals.

title: Cats meow more at men to get their attention, study suggests
summary: A small study reveals that cats greet male owners more vocally than female ones. But the findings could be a result of cultural norms among the participants, rather than a universal cat behavior, scientists say.

title: 'A huge surprise': 1,500-year-old church found next to Zoroastrianism place of worship in Iraq
summary: A 2,000-year-old palace in the Republic of Georgia and a 1,500-year-old church in Iraq suggest Zoroastrians coexisted with people of other religions.

title: Best space photos of 2025
summary: An alien comet, a Martian volcano, a man’s fall from the sun and a groundbreaking telescope’s first images: Here are the most jaw-dropping space photos of 2025.

title: 8 Best Space Heaters (2025): Tested, Measured, and Mistreated
summary: These portable heaters will heat a room quickly, quietly, and safely.

title: Glittering new James Webb telescope image shows an 'intricate web of chaos' — Space photo of the week
summary: This mash-up of data from the James Webb Space Telescope and the Chandra X-ray Observatory reveals two galaxies mid-collision, with their spiral arms overlapping and bending toward their neighbors' cores.

title: Why is Venus so bright?
summary: The "morning star" is bright because of several factors, including having an atmosphere filled with sulfuric acid.

title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS is rapidly moving away from us. Can we 'intercept' it before it leaves us forever?
summary: 3I/ATLAS has passed its closest point to Earth, meaning we will soon lose sight of it for good. Some scientists want to send a spacecraft to chase down the alien comet — or the next interstellar object.

title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS makes closest pass of Earth. Where's it heading next?
summary: Everyone's favorite interstellar comet, 3I/ATLAS, flew past Earth overnight, coming within about 168 million miles (270 million kilometers) of our planet.

title: 1,400 years ago, Nubians tattooed their toddlers. Archaeologists are trying to figure out why.
summary: More than a dozen mummies of kids with facial tattoos were found at an archaeological site in Christian-era Nubia.

title: Stargazing over the Christmas holidays 2025: 10 great reasons to look up
summary: Your guide to the best sights the night sky has to offer from Dec. 20, 2025, to Jan. 4, 2026 — and the gear you'll need to see them.

title: Ursid meteor shower 2025: When and where to see 'shooting stars' on the longest night of the year
summary: Here's how to see the Ursid meteor shower, which peaks in dark skies close to a new moon this year.

title: Diarrhea and stomachaches plagued Roman soldiers stationed at Hadrian's Wall, discovery of microscopic parasites finds
summary: Analysis of latrine sediments at the Roman fort of Vindolanda has revealed that at least three parasites were widespread among Roman soldiers.

title: New ultraviolet image of comet 3I/ATLAS could help reveal what it's made of
summary: NASA's alien-hunting Europa Clipper spacecraft took seven hours of ultraviolet observations of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS while both objects zoom toward Jupiter.

title: Undersea lava rubble acts as a 'sponge' for carbon dioxide, study finds
summary: Lava rubble at the bottom of the sea is acting like a giant "sponge" for carbon dioxide, ancient cores reveal.

title: تعرف عليهم.. 4 أفلام عربية مرشحة لجائزة الأوسكار
summary: في سابقة تاريخية، دخلت 4 أفلام عربية سباق المنافسة على جائزة أوسكار أفضل فيلم دولي، التي تمنحها سنويا أكاديمية علوم وفنون السينما الأميركية للأعمال المنتَجة خارج الولايات المتحدة.

title: إدراج "الكشري المصري" في قائمة "اليونسكو" للتراث
summary: أعلنت منظمة الأمم المتحدة للتربية والعلوم والثقافة (اليونسكو) إدراج "الكشري المصري" على القائمة التمثيلية للتراث الثقافي غير المادي للإنسانية لعام 2025.

title: "الكشري" على رادار اليونسكو.. لماذا طلبت مصر تسجيله رسميا؟
summary: يترقب المصريون حصول "الكشري المصري" على اعتماد منظمة اليونسكو لإدراجه ضمن قائمة التراث الثقافي غير المادي لعام 2025، خلال اجتماع المنظمة المنعقد في العاصمة الهندية نيودلهي، حيث تبحث عشرات الترشيحات المقدمة من 78 دولة.

title: بعد 3 أيام من اختفائه.. إنقاذ طفل سوري دفن حيا في تركيا
summary: أفادت وسائل إعلام تركية بعثور فرق البحث والإنقاذ في ولاية هاتاي على طفل سوري بعد اختفائه يوم الجمعة الماضية، حيث ضربه خاله على رأسه بحجر، وقام بدفنه.

title: زلزال بقوة 6.36 درجة يضرب اليونان ويصل تركيا وإيطاليا
summary: قال المركز الألماني لأبحاث علوم الأرض (جي.إف.زد) اليوم السبت إن زلزالا بقوة 6.36 درجة ضرب اليونان.
